review_title: Working with Quess Singapore for 7 years and counting...
pros: I have been working with Quess Singapore for 7 years now. This is my first company in Singapore and I am sure it would be my last. In my years in this company, I would say I’ve gain a lot! Not only in monetary aspect, but for you to work in an organization that values you and let you feel appreciated in all your contributions to the company’s growth every single year, is what I like the most. I have also gained much more than colleagues, but I’ve felt that I belong to family. A family that helps each other during difficult times, and celebrate with you in all your achievements. I have honed my knowledge and skills here and was able to move up to a position I currently love in just few years in Quess. They helped me grow my professional career and supported me in every way possible way. Though the management has changed in the middle of my time in Quess Singapore, I can say that it changed for the better. The culture and the people in Quess is what I am looking for in an organization, where I can further grow, feel much appreciate and enjoy going to office every single day. If that’s not the culture you’re looking for, I don’t know what is. I look forward to continue working in Quess Singapore and realize my full potential with colleagues that I enjoy working with, and someday I wish to retire with the last company name I will write in my CV as “Quesscorp Singapore Pte. Ltd.” Thank you Quess Singapore.
cons: If you are looking for a company that don't have all the great things I mentioned in pros section, then Quess is not for you.

review_title: Not for software people [ DONT JOIN ]
pros:
1) No defined process for anything.
2) If you negotiate hard you will get above market package.
3) A company for lower staff recruitment.

That's all it is.
cons:
1) Once you will see the offer letter you will realize how pathetic a company can be. They give offer letters in rich text file format.

2) They don't understand how IT works. They are mostly a broker company that recruits for C-Tear companies like Sapient on a contract basis.
 
3) Hire and Fire without even getting paid for notice period. Notice period applies only if you put the paper, if for any reason the project/contract is over they will fire you on the same day and you will get paid only till that day.

4) Speaking of payout, It's a nightmare. Salary payout is always late sometimes even after a week time. So forget about your EMI's and bills. And also for 45 days of work, you will get paid only for 30 days. So they always block 15 days of salary.

5) Their HR system is so incompetent that they mugged a few lines like a customer care service and if you ask Why they get offended. For every question they have one answer, drop me an email I will revert within 48 hours.

6) Companies like these don't come with job securities, they are known for low-end job profiles. And hence it is a joke to even expect/talk about job security here.

7) Health insurance is for 1-3 lakh that too you need to pay hefty. No benefits, No sick leaves, No casual leaves, Only earned leaves which will not be encashed even when you resign.

pros:
Nothing :
Seriously nothing is good about Quess Corp. I have been with Quess when it was Magna and believe me it is one of the worst company to work with. It has become worse to worst in recent days. Salary is being credited that only is the PROS otherwise these guys expect you to work without salary.
cons:
There are infinite cons about this company. I'll try to put some of my points here:
i) Salary is credited on 7th or later of every month. Mostly it goes till 9th or 10th.
ii) They have one of the most unprofessional and incompetent HR's in their company.
iii) POC's hardly call any employee or share any news or announcement that is king on in the organisation.
iv) You have to beg for your appraisals. They start the process after 1 or 2 months and most of the time you will not get the pending arrears of previous 1 or 2 months. This year for AMD India client, Quess Corp has not given appraisals for many citing covid reason.
v) The Mediclaim policy which they provide is one of the worst scams. Avoid taking it. Instead you can avail some medical policy from other insurance company.
vi) No bonus or Diwali gifts or any perks.
vii) Sometimes there are some deduction from your salary and if you send the mail, you hardly get any reply.

review_title: Not recommended, stay far away from this employer
pros: * I worked for Netapp, as contractor, they provided Cab facility and a good cafeteria, no pros from Quess Corp / Magna Infotech
cons:
tldr - Stay away, Zero Growth, Rude and unprofessional HR, you're better off waiting for an offer from a different employer.

* I worked for Quess Corp / Magna Infotech for an year, they hire and provide work forces for other companies, as contractors, my client was Netapp. There is very minimal career growth, salary increments are very low even if you perform well. They will not provide any sort of performance report, I ran behind my designated HR for weeks to requesting for my performance report just to be told they don't provide such things, total BS. 
* There was zero communication between Quess Corp / Magna Infotech and the Manager / Team Lead at Netapp. You will be the point of contact between them, HR was not even ready to talk to the Netapp Manager for any sort of query or complaints, it was annoying and unprofessional. 
* I worked in 24/7 shifts, there were no allowances provided.
* HR was very rude, I contacted her once to request for Form16 and contacted her again after a couple of hours to ask her about a different query and she started shouting at me, telling me to wait for 48hrs, wtf. She never responded back to me with the form16, even though I followed up a couple of times.
* Salary was not on time, always behind 1 - 2 days.
* To lighten up our frustrations, they changed their HR app, the ones that you use to download Payslip and stuff, the app has options to get loans and they added ads about these loans on the Payslips... It has to be one of the most unprofessional, greedy thing that I've seen in my career, they started sending these spam emails about the loan on my personal email address at least twice a day, it was annoying af.

if you question them, you get marked and will start the blame on you only. Ex: A/c is turned off during night shift because of lack of people working in the night shift- response: why is it only you are facing the problem no one else.
Even getting a experience letter is a hell of a process: they take the money from the client but delay or partition it as much as possible. if you question or even a followup will only get things delayed further and the you will be blamed for everything.
My final suggestion, even if its the only job available don't go for it, because you will loose your self respect, confidence, will get nothing out of the experience or proper salary.
